subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Florida Coach Billy Donovan said he is “extremely happy” at Florida, and Louisville Coach Rick Pitino, when asked, said Donovan “would never coach the Knicks.”
snippet: Florida Coach Billy Donovan said he is “extremely happy” at Florida, and Louisville Coach Rick Pitino, when asked, said Donovan “would never coach the Knicks.”
